website_summaries.verdict: The Beyerdynamic DT 990 (32 Ohm) is a headphone pair for music lovers looking for an accurate, crisp sound signature that delivers deep bass without exaggerating it.
pros: Superb audio performance with an accurate response across the board
Well-cushioned and comfortable over long listening periods despite its large frame

customer_reviews.title: 250ohms benefit with a headphone amp.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged these into my Graham Slee solo headphone amp and left them to run for 24hrs. After a quick listen, it was obvious I have not wasted my money. These are a very honest headphone. Sound is mind blowing. Not for commuters, being open back they leak sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: crossed the threshold. Now I know what music feels like.
customer_reviews.text: comfortable, sturdy, sound quality. I am loving it. 1) heavy file size - check (Spotify/tidal) 2) Audiophile headphone - check (DT990 edition 32ohm) 3) DAC/Amp - check (Audioquest Dragonfly Red) complete setup. Using with smartphone and laptop. without dac/amp it was clear but not loud enough. Bass could be better but I am happy with this much.
customer_reviews.author: Gagan M.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable but slight treble understatement
customer_reviews.text: Used when transferring cassettes and LPs and minidiscs to CDR. Very comfortable. Can be worn for long periods without discomfort. Maybe lacks that last degree of treble signal but better than the old edgy headphones I had prior to this.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Barnett

customer_reviews.title: The sound is perfect. Size is a bit bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The sound is perfect. Size is a bit bigger than I thought, but it is light. When plugged into my laptop, sound is fine, but need to increase the volume further when plug into my mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming and music
customer_reviews.text: I use these for online games, single player games and I also listen to a lot of music. The clarity is amazing, with previous headphones I had to turn up the volume to hear a detailed sound, with these headphones I can have the volume much lower and still hear the details. When listening to bassy music I can use an equaliser for more bass and the headphones really deliver a punchy bass that doesn't sound muddy or distorted.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very well-balanced sound. Comfortable, but circular cups (my old Sennheisers are a well-designed oval shape). My 32ohm pair are just about loud enough for my phone, but if you want proper banging volume you need an amp.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brayshaw

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed! Great sound and build quality. Very comfortable. I would like to be able to change cable but it’s minor issue given overall product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: at £100 good headphone great stereo field and nice sound
customer_reviews.author: lynnjeddy

customer_reviews.title: Still good after all the years
customer_reviews.text: Bought originally in 1989 YES 1989 Used them for years with various amps and whilst traveling hotels etc. Replaced the headband cover & ear pads once about 10 yes ago. A few weeks ago by chance plugged them into an iPhone and then android smartphone. WOW in comparison with various Bluetooth and dedicated newer headphones there is no comparison! Rich sounds across the spectrum although with MP3 that's not a big achievement. In 1989 paid about £80 not a major increase for good sound. Four stars as the headband pressure can be a little excessive for prolonged periods... Enjoy...
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Super gift to my teenager son
customer_reviews.text: Great product ! My son is very happy. It was his choice and he is very very happy to play all his games with his new headphone
customer_reviews.author: Heloisa

product_meta.title: beyerdynamic DT 990 Edition 32 Ohm Hi-Fi- Headphone
product_meta.description:
Style Name:32 OhmThe new sophisticated DT 990 is a headphone for enthusiasts and will satisfy you with a perfect sound and comfort. The use of high-quality material and the distinctive design underline the standard of a high end model. The headphone is still handcrafted in Germany warranting a high quality. The present version with 32 Ohms is suitable for the use with portable playback devices, but equally with hi-fi systems, with television or with purpose-built headphone amplifiers

BOX CONTAINS
DT990 Premium Headphone
feature_bullets: Open over-ear headphones for music enjoyment at home on mobile devices such as tablets and smartphones
The excellent sound is especially beloved of pop and rock enthusiasts thanks to distinctive highs and intense bass tones
The open design of the headphones lends the music an especially spacious sound, almost like with speakers
High-quality materials ensure optimum wearing comfort, even when enjoying music for several hours
Made in Germany offers the promise of durability and optimum quality
